title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Mathematics Education Website Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish educational website development plans by applying software engineering methodologies.
Learners can design interactive web content structures aligned with mathematical learning objectives.
Learners can manage small-scale team projects and operate development processes using collaboration tools.
Learners can implement web-based assessment systems to establish learner comprehension measurement frameworks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
